publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3014 Mr Adam Ingram: Mental Health Expenditure-That the Parliament regrets that no mention was made of mental health services during the parliamentary statement by Jack McConnell on the UK Budget and calls on the Scottish Executive to give substance to the lip-service it pays to mental health as a national clinical priority.
S1M-3014 Mental Health Expenditure (lodged on 22 April 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-3014 Mental Health Expenditure (lodged on 22 April 2002) Michael Russell*
S1M-3014 Mental Health Expenditure (lodged on 22 April 2002) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3014 Mr Adam Ingram: Mental Health Expenditure-That the Parliament regrets that no mention was made of mental health services during the parliamentary statement by Jack McConnell on the UK Budget and calls on the Scottish Executive to give substance to the lip-service it pays to mental health as a national clinical priority. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Matheson, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3014 Mental Health Expenditure (lodged on 22 April 2002) Andrew Wilson*, Alex Neil*
S1M-3014 Mental Health Expenditure (lodged on 22 April 2002) Brian Adam*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3014 Mental Health Expenditure (lodged on 22 April 2002) Tricia Marwick*
